title: What is the best Hajj
transcript: and thirdly he says what is the best Hajj for the people in Saudi Arabia this depends if you are able to go and perform uh and stay in mecah for a week or two then do if you are just going there for four or five days and you're close to Mecca and you often go to then make if and if you want to make qan by uh having this intention this is also permissible so it is the best is to do providing that you stay in Mecca
